channel.title: Port forwarding
channel.description:
I have fowarded port 43594, and i have the no-ip duc and i am trying to run project 16 v.4.5. And I just want to know is that the only port i should forward? Or is there a range of ports i should forward.
I have a westell modem given bellsouth, and i have to forward the ports through there server or something. Anyone have the same thing?

item.title: Port forwarding

[quote=“natee, post:3, topic:14406”]it says: DMZ (Demilitarized Zone) is used to allow a single computer on the LAN to be exposed to the Internet.
ip adress:

do i put my static/dnyamic ip adress here?[/quote]
static

should be the only one u should forward

or you could enable DMZ and that will open ALL ports=p
